captions: This is a wide shot showing the city of Porto, Portugal. There is a river running through it with many boats docked along the edge. There are many people walking around on the pier.
Porto, Portugal

This clip showcases a picturesque view of Porto, Portugal, featuring the iconic Dom Luís I Bridge.  The bridge's intricate metal structure spans the Douro River, with colorful buildings lining the waterfront.  Boats traverse the river below.
Porto, Portugal
This video shows an aerial view of the Douro River in Porto, Portugal.  The river is lined with boats and buildings. The Dom Luís I Bridge can be seen in the distance.
Porto, Portugal

This is a shot from a library setting with extensive bookshelves stocked with numerous old books. Towards the back, a dessert shop with customers can be seen. The library exhibits an old-style design.
Porto, Portugal
The clip shows a lively square in Porto, Portugal, at dusk. People are enjoying outdoor seating at cafes and restaurants under white umbrellas. The buildings are traditional, some with azulejo tiles.
Porto, Portugal

This clip captures a picturesque street scene in Porto at twilight. A narrow cobblestone street lined with buildings leads down towards the Douro River, with the opposite bank illuminated by city lights. People stroll along the street, creating a lively and inviting atmosphere.
Porto, Portugal

This clip showcases a scenic view of Porto, Portugal at night, with a bridge and buildings illuminated along the Douro River. People are walking and sitting by the riverbank enjoying the beautiful cityscape. The water reflects the lights creating a picturesque scene.
Porto, Portugal
The clip shows a metro train arriving at a station. Passengers are waiting on the platform for the train to stop. The train is grey and yellow and has the logo 'Metro do Porto'.
Porto Metro, Portugal
This clip shows a river with many boats and a big bridge. Many buildings are visible in the background. This footage appears to be shot in Porto, Portugal.
Porto, Portugal

The clip showcases a cityscape with terracotta roofs, a bridge over a river, and buildings lining the waterfront. The scene captures the architectural charm of Porto, Portugal, on a sunny day. It also shows the Teleferico de Gaia.
Porto, Portugal

The clip shows a street scene in Porto, Portugal, featuring a vintage tram stopped on the tracks. Several buses and cars are parked nearby. The buildings are old with traditional architecture. There's a small outdoor seating area with umbrellas.
Porto, Portugal

This clip shows two old trolleys on a track in Porto, Portugal. The trolleys are decorated with advertisements for Cockburn's Port and Coca-Cola. The trolley is passing by the Arrábida Bridge in the background.
Porto, Portugal

The clip shows a lighthouse on a pier with waves crashing against the rocks and pier. A group of people are standing on the pier near the lighthouse, enjoying the view. The sky is blue with some clouds, creating a bright and scenic atmosphere.
Porto, Portugal
The clip shows the interior of an airport terminal, likely in Porto, Portugal. There are many people waiting near gate 31. We can see a Ryanair airplane outside.
Porto Airport, Portugal
